text: The men's 500 metres races of the 2014–15 ISU Speed Skating World Cup 7, arranged in the Gunda Niemann-Stirnemann-Halle in Erfurt, Germany, was held on the weekend of 21–22 March 2015. ==Race 1== Race one took place on Saturday, 21 March, scheduled in the afternoon session, at 14:18. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" !
